SummaryEnglish:
Resident Evil: Damnation" is a 2012 animated action-horror film directed by Makoto Kamiya and is part of the Resident Evil film series. In this installment, the story follows Leon S. Kennedy, a familiar face from previous Resident Evil games and films. Leon finds himself in the Eastern Slav Republic, a war-torn country in Eastern Europe. There, he uncovers a bioterrorism conspiracy involving the deadly Las Plagas parasite.
As Leon investigates, he encounters Ada Wong, who has her own agenda in the region. Together, they must battle hordes of infected creatures and confront the mastermind behind the biohazard outbreak. The film delves into the dark and dangerous world of bio-organic weapons, government corruption, and the struggle for survival in the face of an impending viral apocalypse.
